attributes.action: Call to the commons to elect The Hon Ann Widdecombe to be the Speaker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the electorate call on the members of the house of commons to elect possibly the most honest MP in Government to become the Speaker of the House.

rejection.details: The PM cannot tell MPs across the Commons how to vote.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
